plot: Four Weddings Canada follows four brides as they attend each others wedding as a guest, and judge the day based on four categories: the dress, the food, the venue and the overall experience...
plot_en: Four Weddings Canada follows four brides as they attend each others wedding as a guest, and judge the day based on four categories: the dress, the food, the venue and the overall experience...
plot_es: Four Weddings Canada follows four brides as they attend each others wedding as a guest, and judge the day based on four categories: the dress, the food, the venue and the overall experience...
title: Four Weddings Canada
